ygData.subject: Re: Dinobot vs. Lord Perseus [Showdown in Atlantis]
ygData.msgSnippet: Dinobot blocked the blade with his forked tail and had to push hard to keep it away from him. However, he was vulnerable to the gunfire and was hit repeatedly.
